nodes.bodyText:
maybe be more explicit here:

  
    
  
    

  
  This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            	syncCmd.Flags().BoolVarP(&NonDestructiveSync, "non-destructive", "n", false, "Don't delete files on remote host")
          
          
            
            	syncCmd.Flags().BoolVarP(&NonDestructiveSync, "non-destructive", "n", false, "Do not delete files on segment hosts that have been deleted on master host")
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -54,6 +56,7 @@ func init() {

+	syncCmd.Flags().BoolVarP(&NonDestructiveSync, "non-destructive", "n", false, "Don't delete files on remote host")

nodes.bodyText: I assume this is the file that was moved from .../pxf/ to cmd correct?
should ERROR be logged at ERROR level rather than INFO ?
thanks for the feedback, I will address these in an upcoming PR.
see the upcoming PR to adjust these log levels.
